settings.accordion_text_5:
How to use your recovery podPRO

This system combo is our most effective and simple to use system to date, Simply inflate your tub using the pro paddle board pump, connect the inlet and outlet pipes to the chiller unit using a simple hand tight valve, turn on your chiller and let it self prime until its ready to chill. once it has finished its priming cycle it will start to chill your water and filter in within a few minuets.

Chill time is between 4-5hrs to take your water temp from 18°C to a frosty 3°C.

How long should you stay in cold water?

Cold water therapy works best with the right combination of time and temperature. For example, if you're in a 10°C degree river, we'd recommend a 10mins.

Temp to Time Examples

1°C = 1min Submersion
2°C = 2min's Submersion
3°C = 3min's Submersion
5°C = 5min's Submersion
10°C = 10min's Submersion
15°C = 15min's Submersion

We have put together a quick breathing guide to help you get started with your cold water therapy CLICK HERE. We've designed our bath to fit anyone up to 2.1m tall (6' 7"), with thanks to our local rugby friends at Exeter Chiefs.

Remember to turn off your chiller when dipping, and now enjoy your first dip.

settings.custom_liquid:
Recovery Pod PRO 5★ Reviews

Read Reviews

settings.title: How does cold water help?
settings.text: When our bodies are exposed to extreme cold, we have a 'fight or flight' response that kicks into action. This is usually triggered by stress or danger.Once our fight or flight response starts working, the stress hormone noradrenaline is released, which makes us more alert and boosts our concentration, among many other important things.

settings.title: How cold does it keep the water
settings.text: Our Chiller PRO will keep the water at a low of 3 degrees all whilst filtering and and keeping your water fresh as a daisy.

settings.title: Does it keep the water clean?
settings.text: Yes! the filtration system has a partical filter keeping out any debre or bugs, with an additional UV filter making this the cleanest water possible and and anti microbial.

settings.title: Does it need to be left on?
settings.text: We recommend leaving your chiller on at all times, this is so that it can filter the water keeping it fresh, the chiller itself will turn off when it reaches your desired temp making it super energy efficient.

settings.title: Can you fit 2 people in it?
settings.text: Yes we have tested this with many differnt people and yand ou can comfotable fit two people in the bath at the same time facing one another. the bath is 1.5cm long.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.text: Here you can find all the frequently asked questions our customers have asked us about our Recovery Pod Pro ice bath, hopefully your question will be answered here!
